title: Are tattoos allowed in PES
content:
I've got a provisional seat for Bdes at PESIT(RR Campus) for the upcoming academic year, so I'm just curious if tattoos are allowed.
Or whether there's a rule like "If you have tattoos, make sure it isn't visible"?
It may sound like a stupid, unnecessary question, and I would say it definitely is stupid, but I'm just interested because I'm thinking of getting a small forearm tattoo after exams lmao

comments.body: There's no rule against tattoos... Just against wearing shorts in campus

Ooh, there's a shorts rule?  


I'm male, how much do you think I can get away with at PES? Also, who will ever catch me?

To start  
1) You won't be allowed inside the gate  
2) Literally every security guard and bouncer will belt you  
3) The college is small, you will get caught (i hope yo don't tho xD)  
4) Be a legend and try removing this rule, thanks
